doc.title: Death's Door
doc.plot: When a junkie career criminal embarks on a normal score, he hits the jackpot. An old Georgian house in an upmarket part of town holds a loot that will ease his immediate worries and needs. However, the intruder doesn't expect to be challenged by the occupant who lays on his death bed in the living room. What ensues is a battle of moral and ethical wits.
